test.name: Login and Add Product to Cart

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'dong ho' into text field 'xpath=//html/body/section[1]/div[2]/div/div/div[2]/div/div/div[2]/input'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.msg: Pressing special key ENTER to element.
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.msg: Executing JavaScript: window.scrollBy(0, 500) Without any arguments.
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.msg: Pressing special key DELETE to element.
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text '2' into text field 'xpath=//div[@class='f23-product-detail-info-row cart-segment ']//input[@class='quantity-input']'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//button[contains(@class, 'add-cart-btn') and .//span[contains(text(), 'Thêm vào giỏ hàng')]]'.
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.arg: xpath=//div[contains(text(),'Đã thêm sản phẩm vào giỏ hàng thành công!')]
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//a[contains(@class, 'mz-btn') and contains(text(), 'Xem giỏ hàng và thanh toán')]'.
kw.arg: xpath=//a[contains(@class, 'mz-btn') and contains(text(), 'Xem giỏ hàng và thanh toán')]
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Get Value
kw.doc: Returns the value attribute of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.arg: Số lượng sản phẩm trong giỏ hàng: ${cart_quantity}
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
